Two beads of mass \(m\) are constrained to move along two horizontal frictionless rails that make an angle \(2\theta \) with respect to each other. They are connected by a spring with spring constant k. What is the frequency of oscillations for the motion where the two beads always stay parallel to each other (ie: the distance between the meeting point of the rails and each particle is equal)? In your answer type theta for \(\theta\).
